sourcesContent:
import React from "react" import { Card, Col, Container, Row, CardBody, CardTitle, Label, Button, Form, Input, InputGroup, } from "reactstrap" //Import Breadcrumb import Breadcrumbs from "../../components/Common/Breadcrumb" const FormLayouts = () => { return (
Form Grid layout
Horizontal form layout
Auto Sizing
@
{/* end row */} Inline forms
@
Floating labels

Create beautifully simple form labels that float over your input fields.
{/* container-fluid */}
) } export default FormLayouts
